name: Lockpickurrr
description:
Lockpickurr is a game we made with a small group of four for a college assignment. It had to be an entertainment game with certain restrictions that would dictate your design. 

In this game you sneak around trying to avoid the guards and pick the locks to escape your dungeon cell. 
Not very original I know but it's just for school so pfftt whatevs~

It is still in early development and needs a lot of polishing. Do not expect a fully functioning optimized game.
